subtitleNullable: Dataset of LEGO minifigures of varying types.
descriptionNullable:
**Content**
Dataset contains pictures of varying LEGO minifigures against a black background.

Several of the minifigures are pictured multiple times with different outfits, hairstyles, and helmets - making it easy to practice image classification and GAN generation with these images.

| **Field** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| Image_Id | Filename. |
| Human? | 1 - If the minifigure is humanoid, 0 - if not  |
| Hair? | 1 - If the minifigure has hair, 0 - if not |
| Hat? | 1 - If the minifigure has a hat on or is wearing a helmet that shows the face, 0 - if not |
| Helmet? | 1 - If the minifigure has a full helmet that masks the face, 0 - if not |

**Acknowledgements**

Inspired by [ihelon](https://www.kaggle.com/ihelon). Thank you to [LEGO](https://www.lego.com/en-us?gclid=CjwKCAjwh8mlBhB_EiwAsztdBApkYY2PXKt1Vpxivu3wlPMRVwaS-cQKdexk8SaTe65GSpV6IBuyTBoC3PUQAvD_BwE&ef_id=CjwKCAjwh8mlBhB_EiwAsztdBApkYY2PXKt1Vpxivu3wlPMRVwaS-cQKdexk8SaTe65GSpV6IBuyTBoC3PUQAvD_BwE:G:s&s_kwcid=AL!790!3!514294265894!e!!g!!lego!12741922966!127689513984&cmp=KAC-INI-GOOGUS-GO-US-EN-RE-PS-BUY-CREATE-MASTERBRAND-SHOP-BC-EX-RN-LEGO_CORE). 

Background Images can be found on [Pexels.com](https://www.pexels.com/search/free%20no%20copyright/).
